mapper.sql: user_id, birthday, create_time, status, description, email, locked, nick_name, password, sex, telephone, update_time, user_name
mapper.insert: insert into user (user_id, birthday, create_time, status, description, email, locked, nick_name, password, sex, telephone, update_time, user_name) values (#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{locked,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into user
user_id,
birthday,
create_time,
status,
description,
email,
locked,
nick_name,
password,
sex,
telephone,
update_time,
user_name,

mapper.update:
update user
birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
locked = #{locked,jdbcType=INTEGER},
nick_name = #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER},
telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update user set birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, locked = #{locked,jdbcType=INTEGER}, nick_name = #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from user order by create_time desc limit #{offset},#{pageSize}
mapper.insert:
insert into user
user_id,
birthday,
create_time,
status,
description,
email,
locked,
nick_name,
password,
sex,
telephone,
update_time,
user_name,
#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{locked,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE update_time=values(update_time), nick_name=VALUES(nick_name), sex=VALUES(sex), birthday=VALUES(birthday), telephone=VALUES(telephone), email=VALUES(email), locked=VALUES(locked), description=VALUES(description), status=VALUES(status)
